DOC.brief_summary: The goal research study discover genetic environmental factor contribute cause neural tube defect spina bifida anencephaly . Ultimately , type research may result improved diagnosis , improve treatment possibly prevention .
DOC.detailed_description: Participation study entirely voluntary . Individuals currently pregnant pregnancy diagnose anencephaly acrania quality participate . Participation involve : 1 . Completing write consent form 2 . A phone conversation collect family medical information 3 . Collection blood sample parent pregnancy 4 . Provide fetal DNA sample ( cord blood , fetal tissue amniotic fluid ) 5. Review medical record ultrasound image
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Current pregnancy diagnose anencephaly acrania . Exclusion criterion : Does qualify pregnancy already end DNA sample available .
